app.name: Thank you
app.short_description: Automatically solve tickets that reopened because of a 'Thank you' message
app.long_description:
Stop waste your agents time because of the 'thank you' messages for the end-user  
 Isn't it's annoying that you spend your time answering, to help to SOLVE the ticket but the ticket reopened because of a thank you message?  
  The thank-you plugin will analyze every comment on a ticket that reopened using an AI the plugin will close a ticket if the intent of the message it's 'thank you'.  
  Our plugin support all the languages!  
  Stop wasting your agents' time and get the thank you plugin right now!
app.installation_instructions:
**To install the app**:  

 - Install the app from the Zendesk Marketplace clicking the Install button on the top right of this page  
 - Click on the icon of the app on the left of your Zendesk Interface to create an account using an apikey!
